Package org.pepstock.charba.client.adapters

Class JsDateAdapterHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.adapters.JsDateAdapterHelper
  • final class JsDateAdapterHelper
extends Object
    This is a singleton wrapper for Java native object which is wrapping a CHARBA java script object implementation to create a date adapter from CHART.JS. This wrapper is necessary to ensure that script is injected with CHART.JS.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • getEpochByWeek

        double getEpochByWeek​(int weekYear,
                      int weekNumber,
                      DateAdapterOptions options)
        Returns a epoch time in millisecond by a year and a weeks.
        Parameters:
        weekYear - the year of the week
        weekNumber - the week in the year
        options - options to configure date adapter
        Returns:
        calculated epoch time in millisecond

      • getEpochByOrdinal

        double getEpochByOrdinal​(int year,
                         int ordinal,
                         DateAdapterOptions options)
        Returns a epoch time in millisecond by a year and a ordinal.
        Parameters:
        year - the year of the week
        ordinal - the ordinal day in the year
        options - options to configure date adapter
        Returns:
        calculated epoch time in millisecond
